# VisualShaderNodeVectorCompose

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeVectorBase](VisualShaderNodeVectorBase.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Composes a [Vector2](Vector2.md), [Vector3](Vector3.md) or 4D vector (represented as a [Quaternion](Quaternion.md)) from scalars within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Creates a ``vec2``, ``vec3`` or ``vec4`` using scalar values that can be provided from separate inputs.
